mapper.select:
select DEPT_NAME, 1 IS_UNPAID_DEPT,ID AS DEPT_ID from ERP_ADD_DEPTS_APPLY WHERE CITY_ID = #{cityId} and COMP_NO=#{compNo} AND VALIDITY_FLAG = 0
and REG_ID = #{regId}
